classloader.loadedClasses.count.description: Displays the number of classes that are currently loaded in the Java virtual machine.

classloader.loadedClasses.total.description: Displays the total number of classes that have been loaded since the Java virtual machine has started execution.

classloader.unloadedClasses.total.description: Displays the total number of classes unloaded since the Java virtual machine has started execution.

cpu.availableProcessors.description: Displays the number of processors available to the Java virtual machine. This value may change during a particular invocation of the virtual machine.

cpu.processCpuLoad.description: Displays the "recent cpu usage" for the Java Virtual Machine process.

cpu.processCpuTime.description: Displays the CPU time used by the process on which the Java virtual machine is running in nanoseconds

cpu.systemLoadAverage.description: Displays the system load average for the last minute. The system load average is the sum of the number of runnable entities queued to the available processors and the number of runnable entities running on the available processors averaged over a period of time. The way in which the load average is calculated is operating system specific but is typically a damped time-dependent average. If the load average is not available, a negative value is displayed. This attribute is designed to provide a hint about the system load and may be queried frequently. The load average may be unavailable on some platform where it is expensive to implement this method.

gc.time.description: Displays the approximate accumulated collection elapsed time in milliseconds. This attribute displays -1 if the collection elapsed time is undefined for this collector. The Java virtual machine implementation may use a high resolution timer to measure the elapsed time. This attribute may display the same value even if the collection count has been incremented if the collection elapsed time is very short.

gc.total.description: Displays the total number of collections that have occurred. This attribute lists -1 if the collection count is undefined for this collector.

jvm.uptime.description: Displays the uptime of the Java virtual machine

memory.committedHeap.description: Displays the amount of memory that is committed for the Java virtual machine to use.

memory.committedNonHeap.description: Displays the amount of memory that is committed for the Java virtual machine to use.

memory.maxHeap.description: Displays the maximum amount of memory in bytes that can be used for memory management.

memory.maxNonHeap.description: Displays the maximum amount of memory in bytes that can be used for memory management.

memory.usedHeap.description: Displays the amount of used memory.

memory.usedNonHeap.description: Displays the amount of used memory.

thread.daemon.count.description: Displays the current number of live daemon threads.

thread.max.count.description: Displays the peak live thread count since the Java virtual machine started or peak was reset. This includes daemon and non-daemon threads.

BufferPool_used_memory_direct.description: The memory used by the NIO pool: direct

BufferPool_used_memory_mapped.description: The memory used by the NIO pool: mapped

memoryPool.Code Cache.usage.description: Current usage of the Code Cache memory pool

memoryPool.Code Cache.usage.max.description: Peak usage of the Code Cache memory pool

memoryPool.Compressed Class Space.usage.description: Current usage of the Compressed Class Space memory pool

memoryPool.Compressed Class Space.usage..description: Peak usage of the Compressed Class Space memory pool

memoryPool.Eden Space.usage.description: Current usage of the Eden Space memory pool

memoryPool.Eden Space.usage.max.description: Peak usage of the Eden Space memory pool

memoryPool.Metaspace.usage.description: Current usage of the Metaspace memory pool

memoryPool.Metaspace.usage.max.description: Peak usage of the Metaspace memory pool

memoryPool.Survivor Space.usage.description: Current usage of the Survivor Space memory pool

memoryPool.Survivor Space.usage.max.description: Peak usage of the Survivor Space memory pool

memoryPool.Tenured Gen.usage.description: Current usage of the Tenured Gen memory pool

memoryPool.Tenured Gen.usage.max.description: Peak usage of the Tenured Gen memory pool

wildfly_batch_jberet_active_count.description: The approximate number of threads that are actively executing tasks.

wildfly_batch_jberet_completed_task_coun.description: The approximate total number of tasks that have completed execution.

wildfly_batch_jberet_current_thread_coun.description: The current number of threads in the pool.

wildfly_batch_jberet_largest_thread_coun.description: The largest number of threads that have ever simultaneously been in the pool.

wildfly_batch_jberet_rejected_count.description: The number of tasks that have been rejected.

wildfly_batch_jberet_task_count.description: The approximate total number of tasks that have ever been scheduled for execution.

wildfly_datasources_jdbc_prepared_statem.description: The number of times that the statement cache was accessed
The number of statements added to the statement cache
The number of prepared and callable statements currently cached in the statement cache
The number of statements discarded from the cache
The number of times that statements from the cache were used
The number of times that a statement request could not be satisfied with a statement from the cache

wildfly_datasources_pool_average_creatio.description: The average time spent creating a physical connection

wildfly_datasources_pool_average_get_tim.description: The average time spent obtaining a physical connection

wildfly_datasources_pool_average_pool_ti.description: The average time for a physical connection spent in the pool

wildfly_datasources_pool_average_usage_t.description: The average time spent using a physical connection

wildfly_datasources_pool_blocking_failur.description: The number of failures trying to obtain a physical connection

wildfly_datasources_pool_idle_count.description: The number of physical connections currently idle

wildfly_datasources_pool_in_use_count.description: The number of physical connections currently in use

wildfly_datasources_pool_max_creation_ti.description: The maximum time for creating a physical connection

wildfly_datasources_pool_max_get_time.description: The maximum time for obtaining a physical connection

wildfly_datasources_pool_max_pool_time.description: The maximum time for a physical connection in the pool

wildfly_datasources_pool_max_usage_time.description: The maximum time using a physical connection

wildfly_datasources_pool_max_used_count.description: The maximum number of connections used

wildfly_datasources_pool_max_wait_count.description: The maximum number of threads waiting for a connection

wildfly_datasources_pool_max_wait_time.description: The maximum wait time for a connection

wildfly_datasources_pool_total_creation_.description: The total time spent creating physical connections

wildfly_datasources_pool_total_get_time.description: The total time spent obtaining physical connections

wildfly_datasources_pool_total_pool_time.description: The total time spent by physical connections in the pool

wildfly_datasources_pool_total_usage_tim.description: The total time spent using physical connections

wildfly_datasources_pool_wait_count.description: The number of requests that had to wait to obtain a physical connection

wildfly_datasources_pool_xacommit_averag.description: The average time for a XAResource commit invocation

wildfly_datasources_pool_xacommit_count.description: The number of XAResource commit invocations

wildfly_datasources_pool_xacommit_max_ti.description: The maximum time for a XAResource commit invocation

wildfly_datasources_pool_xacommit_total_.description: The total time for all XAResource commit invocations

wildfly_datasources_pool_xaend_average_t.description: The average time for a XAResource end invocation

wildfly_datasources_pool_xaend_count.description: The number of XAResource end invocations

wildfly_datasources_pool_xaend_max_time.description: The maximum time for a XAResource end invocation

wildfly_datasources_pool_xaend_total_tim.description: The total time for all XAResource end invocations

wildfly_datasources_pool_xaforget_averag.description: The average time for a XAResource forget invocation

wildfly_datasources_pool_xaforget_count.description: The number of XAResource forget invocations

wildfly_datasources_pool_xaforget_max_ti.description: The maximum time for a XAResource forget invocation

wildfly_datasources_pool_xaforget_total_.description: The total time for all XAResource forget invocations

wildfly_datasources_pool_xaprepare_avera.description: The average time for a XAResource prepare invocation

wildfly_datasources_pool_xaprepare_count.description: The number of XAResource prepare invocations

wildfly_datasources_pool_xaprepare_max_t.description: The maximum time for a XAResource prepare invocation

wildfly_datasources_pool_xaprepare_total.description: The total time for all XAResource prepare invocations

wildfly_datasources_pool_xarecover_avera.description: The average time for a XAResource recover invocation

wildfly_datasources_pool_xarecover_count.description: The number of XAResource recover invocations

wildfly_datasources_pool_xarecover_max_t.description: The maximum time for a XAResource recover invocation

wildfly_datasources_pool_xarecover_total.description: The total time for all XAResource recover invocations

wildfly_datasources_pool_xarollback_aver.description: The average time for a XAResource rollback invocation

wildfly_datasources_pool_xarollback_coun.description: The number of XAResource rollback invocations

wildfly_datasources_pool_xarollback_max_.description: The maximum time for a XAResource rollback invocation

wildfly_datasources_pool_xarollback_tota.description: The total time for all XAResource rollback invocations

wildfly_datasources_pool_xastart_average.description: The average time for a XAResource start invocation

wildfly_datasources_pool_xastart_count.description: The number of XAResource start invocations

wildfly_datasources_pool_xastart_max_tim.description: The maximum time for a XAResource start invocation

wildfly_datasources_pool_xastart_total_t.description: The total time for all XAResource start invocations

wildfly_ee_active_thread_count.description: The approximate number of threads that are actively executing tasks.

wildfly_ee_completed_task_count.description: The approximate total number of tasks that have completed execution.

wildfly_ee_current_queue_size.description: The current size of the executor's task queue.

wildfly_ee_hung_thread_count.description: The number of executor threads that are hung.

wildfly_ee_max_thread_count.description: The largest number of executor threads.

wildfly_ee_task_count.description: The approximate total number of tasks that have ever been submitted for execution.

wildfly_ee_thread_count.description: The current number of executor threads.

wildfly_ejb3_active_count.description: The approximate number of threads that are actively executing tasks.

wildfly_ejb3_completed_task_count.description: The approximate total number of tasks that have completed execution.

wildfly_ejb3_current_thread_count.description: The current number of threads in the pool.

wildfly_ejb3_largest_thread_count.description: The largest number of threads that have ever simultaneously been in the pool.

wildfly_ejb3_rejected_count.description: The number of tasks that have been rejected.

wildfly_ejb3_task_count.description: The approximate total number of tasks that have ever been scheduled for execution.

wildfly_io_busy_task_thread_count.description: An estimate of busy threads in the task worker thread pool

wildfly_io_core_pool_size.description: Minimum number of threads to keep in the underlying thread pool even if they are idle. Threads over this limit will be terminated over time specified by task-keepalive attribute.

wildfly_io_max_pool_size.description: The maximum number of threads to allow in the thread pool. Depending on implementation, when this limit is reached, tasks which cannot be queued may be rejected.

wildfly_io_queue_size.description: An estimate of the number of tasks in the worker queue.

wildfly_jca_current_thread_count.description: The current number of threads in the pool.

wildfly_jca_largest_thread_count.description: The largest number of threads that have ever simultaneously been in the pool.

wildfly_jca_rejected_count.description: The number of tasks that have been passed to the handoff-executor (if one is specified) or discarded.

wildfly_request_controller_active_reques.description: The number of requests that are currently running in the server

wildfly_transactions_average_commit_time.description: The average time of transaction commit, measured from the moment the client calls commit until the transaction manager determines that the commit attempt was successful.

wildfly_transactions_number_of_aborted_t.description: The number of aborted (i.e. rolledback) transactions.

wildfly_transactions_number_of_applicati.description: The number of transactions that have been rolled back by application request. This includes those that timeout, since the timeout behavior is considered an attribute of the application configuration.

wildfly_transactions_number_of_heuristic.description: The number of transactions which have terminated with heuristic outcomes.

wildfly_transactions_number_of_inflight_.description: The number of transactions that have begun but not yet terminated.

wildfly_transactions_number_of_nested_tr.description: The total number of nested (sub) transactions created.

wildfly_transactions_number_of_resource_.description: The number of transactions that rolled back due to resource (participant) failure.

wildfly_transactions_number_of_system_ro.description: The number of transactions that have been rolled back due to internal system errors.

wildfly_transactions_number_of_timed_out.description: The number of transactions that have rolled back due to timeout.

wildfly_transactions_number_of_transacti.description: The total number of transactions (top-level and nested) created

wildfly_undertow_bytes_received.description: The number of bytes that have been received by this listener

wildfly_undertow_bytes_sent.description: The number of bytes that have been sent out on this listener

wildfly_undertow_error_count.description: The number of 500 responses that have been sent by this listener

wildfly_undertow_expired_sessions.description: Number of sessions that have expired

wildfly_undertow_highest_session_count.description: The maximum number of sessions that have been active simultaneously

wildfly_undertow_max_active_sessions.description: The maximum allowed number of concurrent sessions that this session manager supports

wildfly_undertow_max_processing_time.description: The maximum processing time taken by a request on this listener

wildfly_undertow_processing_time.description: The total processing time of all requests handed by this listener

wildfly_undertow_request_count.description: The number of requests this listener has served

wildfly_undertow_session_avg_alive_time.description: Average time that expired sessions had been alive

wildfly_undertow_session_max_alive_time.description: The longest time that an expired session had been alive
